In this module, you will learn how to identify scams via SMS and phone calls. We will teach best practices to avoid falling for banking and identity fraud.
1. Never click on suspicious links sent via SMS or email.
2. Always verify the source of the number before answering unknown calls.
3. Banks never ask for full passwords over the phone or via messages.
4. If you receive a money request from a family member, confirm directly with them before transferring.
5. If in doubt, ask a family member for help or call the bank\'s official support.

Module: WhatsApp
WhatsApp
In this module, you will learn how to send messages, voice notes, and make video calls on WhatsApp.
1. To send a message, tap the chat icon and select a contact.
2. Type your message and tap the send button (right arrow).
3. To send a voice note, press and hold the microphone icon and speak.
4. To make a video call, open the contact\'s chat and tap the camera icon.
5. Never share passwords or security codes via WhatsApp!
In this module, you will learn how to make calls, answer calls, and save contacts.
1. To make a call, open the phone app and dial the desired number.
2. Tap the call button (phone icon) to start the call.
3. To answer a call, swipe the green button up.
4. To save a contact, tap "Add Contact" after the call.
5. You can block unknown numbers in the phone app settings.
